name: AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getRuntimeTaskWithSelection
description: Returns tasks by criteria with selection
sail_code:
rule!AS_GSS_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_TASK,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_Task',
  logicalExpression: ri!additionalLogicalExpressions,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskBehaviorType.behaviorTypeCode",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!behaviorTypeCode
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskBehaviorType.behaviorSubtypeCode",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!behaviorSubtypeCode
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!taskId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskStatus.taskStatusId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!taskStatusIds
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskRefId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!taskRefIds
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "taskCategory.categoryName",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!categoryName
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "userAssignee",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!userAssignee
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  selectionColumns: ri!selectionColumns
)
